definitions.body: : Ez Eze 3:9 thorn(s), adamant, flint;—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: Is 5:6 +; sf. [[שְׁמִירוֹ]] Is 10:17;—
coll. thorns, thorn-bushes, token of waste-land, only Is, + [[שַׁיִת]] Is 5:6, Is 7:23, Is 7:24, Is 7:25, Is 27:4; fig. Is 9:17, Is 10:17; ´[[קוֹץ שׁ]]: Is 32:13.
adamant, as sharp, [[בְּחִפּׂרֶן]]…[[כְּתוּבָה]]: ´[[שׁ]]: Je 17:1 (‖[[בְּעֵט בַּדְוֶל ]]); as hard, fig. of prophet’s firmness Ez Eze 3:9; Zec 7:12 fig. of hard heart.
